TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Dwight_Anderson, title = Dwight_Anderson, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwight_Anderson} }

S.FORM: Dwight Anderson nalecuh i Dayton Ohio ciniza, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dwight Anderson i 1982 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 41, namapili' tu nu Washington Bullets putiput. 12 bulad 28 demiad, 1960 a mihca, Dwight Anderson, miunduay.

Dwight Anderson nalecoh i Dayton Ohio ciniza, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Dwight Anderson i 1982 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 41, namapili' to no Washington Bollets potipot. 12 bolad 28 demiad, 1960 a mihca, Dwight Anderson, miondoay.
